results.title: Astroboy 11
results.creator_credit: Del Lewis, Carl Battaglia, Nihon Terebi and Tezuka Productions
results.brief_description: Three epsiodes of the adventures of the boy robot Astro created by Osamu Tezuka. The titles include: “The Baby elephant”; Astro befriends an elephant who is orphaned when its mother wanders into a safari park; “The Transformation robot”; Pook is a special robot Astro meets on an island. Pook has the ability to transform himself into any shape, which can be dangerous if he gets into evil hands!; “The Crystal of the desert”; Astro discovers trouble when he investigates the cause of a series of strange droughts. It comes in the form of Atlas, living inside a crystal in the middle of the desert.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Del Lewis, Carl Battaglia, Nihon Terebi and Tezuka Productions

results.title: Ask an Australian about surfing [Italian version]
results.creator_credit: Alex Ezard and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained. The importance of observing safety precautions, such as swimming between the flags and clearing the water when the shark alarm is sounded is emphasised. Note: In Italian.
results.description: Shows the dangers of swimming in the surf. The role that surf life-saving clubs play on a surf beach is explained.
